description: Variation of conditions 2 (Approved Plans), 4 (Tree Protection Plan), 5 (Arboricultural Method Statement), 7 (Basement Method Statement and Flood Risk), 10 (Distric Heating), 11 (Energy Strategy), 12 (Energy Implementation), 16 (Ecology), 21(Restriction/Protection of Office Use), 22 (Restriction of Cafe Use), 28 (Waste Management Strategy), 29 (Waste and Recycling Storage), 39(Vehicle Turning Area), 40 (Delvery and Servicing Plan), 41 (Travel Plan) and 42 (Parts of the Development) of planning permission 16/02387/FUL (Demolition, alteration and refurbishment of existing buildings and structures and erection of new buildings and structures to provide academic and commercially flexible professional floorspace for medical education purposes (Class D1) and/or office space (Class B1) and a caf√© (Class A3); in addition to landscaping and public realms works (including the removal of 3no. trees); alteration to existing and creation of new basements; utility and low carbon energy equipment; alterations to pedestrian access into the site; infrastructure and associated facilities of Block 9 and Prideaux building at at the St Thomas Hospital Campus) granted on 27.04.2017.
